FRISCO, Texas — Micah Parsons understands DeMarcus Lawrence’s goal.
The reigning defensive rookie of the year aspires, respectfully, to thwart it.

articles.title: Missouri State baseball players share gross photos of hotel conditions during NCAA Tournament trip - News-Leader
articles.description: Photos from the hotel include "mysterious undergarments," stains on mattresses and more.
articles.content:
